experience.description: Made some good coffee, provided customer service, and managed multiple tasks simultaneously. Developed teamwork, communication, and problem-solving skills in a fast-paced café and boutique environment, while learning about inventory and sales management.

Completed an intensive fullstack development program, building real-world projects using modern web technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Gained hands-on experience in coding, debugging, and collaborating with peers on project work, while strengthening problem-solving and logical thinking skills.

Designed and developed websites, branding, and visual content for a variety of clients. Combined technical development skills with creative design thinking to deliver cohesive digital experiences, while learning client communication, project management, and creative problem solving.

Supported community events, workshops, and initiatives aimed at making tech more inclusive for women and non-binary people. Helping to create an encouraging environment for learning and networking in technology.

Learned the fundamentals of Java programming, including object-oriented programming, data structures, and basic algorithms. Completed exercises and small projects to apply theory to practical programming problems.

Designed and developed key features for FixMeApp, a web application for booking beauty appointments, integrating AI-powered functionalities. Conducted user research, created wireframes and prototypes, and implemented design solutions to enhance usability and user experience.
I'm so excited to start the journey at Chas Academy! Looking forward to getting to know my fellow students! :D
